scripts.build:extension: vite build --config vite.config.ts && npm run copy-extension-files
scripts.build:extension:chrome: vite build --config vite.config.ts && npm run copy-extension-files:chrome
scripts.build:extension:firefox: vite build --config vite.config.ts && npm run copy-extension-files:firefox
scripts.copy-extension-files:chrome: cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp public/popup.html dist/ && cp public/popup.css dist/ && cp public/content-script.css dist/ && cp public/warning-overlay.html dist/ && cp -r public/icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy-extension-files:firefox: cp public/manifest-firefox.json dist/manifest.json && cp public/popup.html dist/ && cp public/popup.css dist/ && cp public/content-script.css dist/ && cp public/warning-overlay.html dist/ && cp -r public/icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
